modName: Lord of the Returning Dead - Armor - Weapon - Npc - Dungeon
summary: Adds a armor / dungeon / weapon / npc
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/PgduYcz.png[/img]

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[img]http://i.imgur.com/asvCYz1.png[/img]

Adds :
- Returning Dead Cuirass
- Returning Dead Boots
- Returning Dead Helmet
- Returning Dead Gloves

- : Created from the bones of ones fallen heroes. Cursed, crafted by the dead. There must always be a lord of the returning dead.

- The Maker of Diseases 1h

- : A sword so feared by its name. Only a mad man would wield this blade and control the dead.

- NPC : The Lord of the Returning Dead.
- Location : Tower of the Dead + Dungeon.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/rIj9Lla.png[/img]

- Go to the tower of the dead, enter the tower and kill the boss to loot his body.
- He is extremely hard and he can give you diseases of the dead.
- The diseases will affect your mana, hp or shout abilities.
- Use enough potions to battle him.
- Magic will do its part but he is ressistant to diseases himself.
- Male and female meshes are the same. (For now only male).

[img]http://i.imgur.com/S2PGUh5.png[/img]

- Long ago a man called Dunderill was sent to prison for crimes he did not commit.
Years in prisson he began to lose his humanity, and one day he was set free.
50 years past from that day and the man became a beggar. No humanity left he did not seek for love or hate.
He became addicted to the dead. The smell, the diseases, the dead.
He began to use spells no one had ever seen, he could bring back the dead.
Not only just bones with magic. But real thinking undead. With minds of there own.
It is said when you seek him you will see his eyes glowing red.
And these dead are part of his soul. There always must be a lord that controls the dead.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/3qnPkgU.png[/img]

Is there a female version ?
- no not yet i can make one, but it can take a while.

Can i use this mod in my mod?
- Ask me in a private message.

Can i edit this mod ?
- No. Short and simple answer.

Will you make this mod easyer? and not so OP?
- Ask me in a private message, if here are enough question about this i could make an alternate version.

Thx to :
- Bethesda
- Creation Kit
- Blender
- Nifskope
- Photoshop
- Steam
- Skyrim

sry for the bad english.
